players.name: Chris
players.flavor_text: Has an evil doppelganger named Evil Chris. May be seen lurking about.

players.name: Alyssa Q.
players.flavor_text: Assumes the form of a bumble-elf - that is a half-elf, half-bumble-bee.

players.name: Andrea
players.flavor_text: Found among the trees and sprites of the forests. Loves cats.

players.name: Zach
players.flavor_text: Rewarded most manly grizzle of our time. Defeats his foes with glances.

players.name: Maria
players.flavor_text: Weapon of choice is throwing her dogs at foes, until they are overwhelmed by The Cute.

players.name: MJ
players.flavor_text: Regularly confused with George Clooney, often seen making pilgrimages to spook towns.
